==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|げん|えい|yomi=on}}

===Etymology===
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=げんえい}} compound {{m|zh|幻影|tr=gwæn ʔjæng<sup>X</sup>|lit=illusion, mirage + shadow}}. Compare modern {{etyl|cmn|-}} {{zh-l|幻影|tr=huànyǐng}}.

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|yomi=o|げんえい|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|げんえい}}

# an [[illusion]], a [[vision]]
# the [[image]] of something, such as in a [[memory]] or [[imagination]]
# {{lb|ja|sort=げんえい|medicine}} a [[phantom]], a [[phantasm]]: a [[perception]] of something that is not there

* {{ja-r|幻影視|げんえいし}}: {{qualifier|medicine|rare}} [[phantasmoscopy]], [[phantasmoscopia]]: seeing [[phantom]]s
